name: Darjeeling Black Tea
description: A premium black tea with a floral aroma and musky sweetness, sourced from the foothills of the Himalayas.

name: Jasmine Green Tea
description: A fragrant green tea infused with the delicate aroma of jasmine flowers, perfect for relaxation.

name: Matcha Green Tea Powder
description: High-grade matcha green tea powder, ideal for traditional tea ceremonies and as a healthy beverage.

name: Earl Grey Tea
description: A classic black tea blend with a hint of bergamot for a citrusy twist, perfect for a refined afternoon tea.

name: Peppermint Herbal Tea
description: A refreshing and soothing herbal tea made from peppermint leaves, great for digestion and relaxation.

name: Chamomile Tea
description: A calming herbal tea made from chamomile flowers, known for its relaxing and sleep-inducing properties.

name: Oolong Tea
description: A traditional Chinese tea with a unique flavor profile that falls between green and black tea.

name: Hibiscus Herbal Tea
description: A tart and tangy herbal tea made from hibiscus flowers, known for its vibrant red color and heart health benefits.

name: Chai Spiced Black Tea
description: A rich and spicy black tea blend with cinnamon, cardamom, and ginger, perfect for a warming cup of chai.

name: Lemongrass Ginger Tea
description: A zesty and refreshing herbal tea blend of lemongrass and ginger, perfect for a soothing pick-me-up.
